column1: Selecione um arquivo de salvamento para armazenar seus dados de jogo.
column2: Select a save file to store your game data.
column3: Select a save file to store your game data.

column1: Selecione os dados do jogo que deseja carregar.
column2: Select the game data you'd like to load.
column3: Select the game data you'd like to load.

column1: Você não possui nenhuma arma elegível para forjar.
column2: You don't have any weapons eligible for forging.
column3: You don't have any weapons eligible for forging.

column1: Você não pode forjar esta arma agora.
column2: You can't forge this weapon right now.
column3: You can't forge this weapon right now.

column1: Você não tem itens para vender.
column2: You have no items to sell.
column3: You have no items to sell.

column1: Não há itens que você possa comprar.
column2: There are no items you can buy.
column3: There are no items you can buy.

column1: Você não possui nenhum item utilizável.
column2: You don't have any usable items.
column3: You don't have any usable items.

column1: Qual é o nome da pessoa que eu realmente gosto?
column2: What's the name of the person I really like?
column3: What's the name of the person I really like?

column1: Qual é a minha comida favorita?
Qual é o meu livro favorito?
Qual é o meu lugar favorito?
Qual é a minha flor favorita?
Quem eu amo mais do que qualquer outra pessoa?
column2: Who do I love more than anyone?
column3: Who do I love more than anyone?

column1: Qual trabalho devo te dar primeiro?
column2: Which job should I give you first?
column3: Which job should I give you first?

column1: Não parece que tenho nenhum trabalho para você agora. Volte quando estiver livre, está bem?
column2: Doesn't look like I have any work for you right now. Come back next time you're free, okay?
column3: Doesn't look like I have any work for you right now. Come back next time you're free, okay?

column1: Volte sempre que tiver um minuto livre.
column2: Come back whenever you have a free minute.
column3: Come back whenever you have a free minute.

column1: Eu anotei a localização do cliente no seu mapa, então vá até lá para obter os detalhes.
column2: I wrote down the client's location on your map, so head over there to get the details.
column3: I wrote down the client's location on your map, so head over there to get the details.

column1: Espere, você não tem um mapa? Ah, tudo bem. Basta pedir ao cliente os detalhes.
column2: Wait, you don't have a map? Ah, well. Just ask the client for the details.
column3: Wait, you don't have a map? Ah, well. Just ask the client for the details.

column1: Ah, você quer um trabalho diferente?
column2: Oh, you want a different job?
column3: Oh, you want a different job?

column1: Acho que a Popola ainda está sofrendo com aquele estúpido resfriado. <LF>Você pode verificar como ela está para mim?
column2: I think Popola's still suffering from that stupid cold. <LF>Can you go check on her for me?
column3: I think Popola's still suffering from that stupid cold. <LF>Can you go check on her for me?

column1: Ei, o porteiro precisa de alguma mensagem entregue.<LF>Coitado nunca sai do posto, então talvez você possa ajudá-lo?
column2: Hey, the gatekeeper needs some kind of message delivered.<LF>Poor guy never leaves his post, so maybe you can help him out?
column3: Hey, the gatekeeper needs some kind of message delivered.<LF>Poor guy never leaves his post, so maybe you can help him out?

column1: Popola disse que tem um trabalho para você.<LF>Ela realmente depende de você, não é mesmo!
column2: Popola said she's got a job for you.<LF>She really depends on you, doesn't she!
column3: Popola said she's got a job for you.<LF>She really depends on you, doesn't she!

column1: Parece que há um morador com um trabalho para você. É sobre galinhas, ou...algo assim?<LF>Não sei, detalhes me entediam. De qualquer forma, basta perguntar ao cliente por mais informações.
column2: Seems there's a villager with a job for you. It's about chickens, or...something?<LF>I don't know, details bore me. Anyway, just go ask the client for more info.
column3: Seems there's a villager with a job for you. It's about chickens, or...something?<LF>I don't know, details bore me. Anyway, just go ask the client for more info.

column1: Rapaz, as senhoras simplesmente não conseguem ter o suficiente de você! Ouvi dizer que outra pessoa está procurando ajuda.<LF>Alguma coisa com carneiro, acho eu?
column2: Boy, the ladies just can't get enough of you! I hear another one's looking for help.<LF>Something to do with mutton, I think?
column3: Boy, the ladies just can't get enough of you! I hear another one's looking for help.<LF>Something to do with mutton, I think?

column1: Parece que a florista está procurando ajuda.<LF>Eu acho que ela precisa de algo de Beira-mar.
column2: Seems like the florist is looking for help.<LF>I guess she needs something from Seafront.
column3: Seems like the florist is looking for help.<LF>I guess she needs something from Seafront.

column1: Ouvi dizer que alguém precisa de ajuda para organizar livros.<LF>Popola está ocupada demais para lidar com isso sozinha, por isso você se importa de ajudar?
column2: I heard someone needs help organizing books.<LF>Popola's too busy to handle it herself, so do you mind helping out?
column3: I heard someone needs help organizing books.<LF>Popola's too busy to handle it herself, so do you mind helping out?

column1: A senhora que dirige a taverna precisa de ajuda.<LF>Ela é aquela com a avó muito cansada.
column2: The lady who runs the tavern needs some help.<LF>She's the one with the really strung-out grandmother.
column3: The lady who runs the tavern needs some help.<LF>She's the one with the really strung-out grandmother.

column1: Parece que alguém está com um problema em mãos.<LF>Eles perderam seus utensílios de cozinha em um incêndio.
column2: Sounds like someone's got a problem on their hands.<LF>They lost their cookware to a fire.
column3: Sounds like someone's got a problem on their hands.<LF>They lost their cookware to a fire.

column1: Parece que a florista precisa fazer algumas compras.
column2: Sounds like the florist needs some shopping done.
column3: Sounds like the florist needs some shopping done.

column1: Um... Bem, isso é um pouco estranho. É da Yonah.<LF>Vá para casa e verifique como ela está, por favor? Acho que ela está solitária.
column2: Um... Well, this is a little weird. It's from Yonah.<LF>Go home and check on her, will you? I think she's lonely.
column3: Um... Well, this is a little weird. It's from Yonah.<LF>Go home and check on her, will you? I think she's lonely.

column1: Alguém quer que você colete um item de Aerie.<LF>Sim, vá perguntar ao cliente mais detalhes. Eu meio que adormeci durante essa parte.
column2: Someone wants you to collect an item from The Aerie.<LF>Yeah, go ask the client for more details. I kind of dozed off during that part.
column3: Someone wants you to collect an item from The Aerie.<LF>Yeah, go ask the client for more details. I kind of dozed off during that part.

column1: Existe um pacote que precisa ser entregue para Aerie.<LF>Algum tipo de pagamento ou dívida de honra ou... sabe. Algo assim.
column2: There's a parcel that needs to be delivered to The Aerie.<LF>Some kind of repayment or honor debt or...you know. Something.
column3: There's a parcel that needs to be delivered to The Aerie.<LF>Some kind of repayment or honor debt or...you know. Something.

column1: Eu tenho um pedido de uma mulher que precisa de peças para reparar a roda-d'água.<LF>Talvez você possa ajudá-la?
column2: I've got a request from a woman who needs parts to repair the waterwheel.<LF>Maybe you can help her out?
column3: I've got a request from a woman who needs parts to repair the waterwheel.<LF>Maybe you can help her out?

column1: Aparentemente, a fonte na praça da vila está apresentando problemas.<LF>Acha que pode dar uma olhada? Por favor? Para mim?
column2: Apparently, the fountain in the village square is breaking down.<LF>Think you could go check it out? Please? For me?
column3: Apparently, the fountain in the village square is breaking down.<LF>Think you could go check it out? Please? For me?

column1: Eu tenho outro pedido de entrega aqui.<LF>Algo sobre um pacote frágil que precisa ir para Beira-mar.
column2: I've got another delivery request here.<LF>Something about a fragile parcel that needs to go to Seafront.
column3: I've got another delivery request here.<LF>Something about a fragile parcel that needs to go to Seafront.

column1: Um veterano em Beira-mar está procurando ajuda.<LF>...Desculpe, mas é tudo o que eu tenho. Ah, e ele disse que te conhece.
column2: An old-timer in Seafront is looking for help.<LF>...Sorry, but that's all I got. Oh, and he said he knows you.
column3: An old-timer in Seafront is looking for help.<LF>...Sorry, but that's all I got. Oh, and he said he knows you.

column1: Aquele velho pescador tem outro trabalho para você.<LF>Vocês estão ficando bem próximos, hein?
column2: That old fisherman's got another job for you.<LF>You guys are getting pretty close, huh?
column3: That old fisherman's got another job for you.<LF>You guys are getting pretty close, huh?

column1: Um construtor naval em Beira-mar precisa de materiais para um trabalho de reparação.<LF>Por que não dá uma olhada?
column2: A shipbuilder in Seafront needs materials for a repair job.<LF>Why don't you go check it out?
column3: A shipbuilder in Seafront needs materials for a repair job.<LF>Why don't you go check it out?

column1: O velho pescador tem outro pedido.<LF> Eu não tinha ideia de que você gostava tanto de peixe!
column2: The old fisherman has another request.<LF>I had no idea you liked fish so much!
column3: The old fisherman has another request.<LF>I had no idea you liked fish so much!

column1: Aquele pescador em Beira-mar voltou com mais trabalho.<LF> Como está a pesca, aliás? Você deve estar melhorando!
column2: That fisherman in Seafront's back with more work.<LF>How's the fishing going, anyway? You must be getting good!
column3: That fisherman in Seafront's back with more work.<LF>How's the fishing going, anyway? You must be getting good!

column1: Adivinha o quê? ... Vamos, adivinha! ... Tá bom, é outro trabalho do pescador.<LF> Pelo menos você terá bastante peixe para comer.
column2: Guess what? ...C'mon, guess! ...Fine, it's another job from the fisherman.<LF>Hey, at least you'll have plenty of fish to eat.
column3: Guess what? ...C'mon, guess! ...Fine, it's another job from the fisherman.<LF>Hey, at least you'll have plenty of fish to eat.

column1: O velho pescador precisa de você novamente.<LF>É bom ver você tendo tanto interesse pelos idosos.
column2: The old fisherman needs you again.<LF>It's good to see you taking such an interest in the elderly.
column3: The old fisherman needs you again.<LF>It's good to see you taking such an interest in the elderly.

column1: De novo? Você acertou - o pescador de Beira-mar voltou.<LF> Tenha cuidado lá fora. Você não gostaria de enganchar o pobre Weiss.
column2: Again? You guessed it—the Seafront fisherman's back.<LF>Be careful out there. You wouldn't want to hook poor Weiss.
column3: Again? You guessed it—the Seafront fisherman's back.<LF>Be careful out there. You wouldn't want to hook poor Weiss.

column1: Surpresa, surpresa. O velho pescador está ligando...<LF> Blá blá blá, certo? Você já conhece o esquema até agora.
column2: Surprise, surprise. The old fisherman's calling...<LF>Blah blah blah, right? You know the deal by now.
column3: Surprise, surprise. The old fisherman's calling...<LF>Blah blah blah, right? You know the deal by now.

column1: O pescador da orla disse que esse próximo trabalho pode custar as vidas de vocês dois! Eu acho que ele está sendo melodramático, mas ainda é meio assustador.
column2: The Seafront fisherman said this next job could cost both of you your lives!<LF>I figure he's just being melodramatic, but it's still kinda spooky.
column3: The Seafront fisherman said this next job could cost both of you your lives!<LF>I figure he's just being melodramatic, but it's still kinda spooky.

column1: Oi! A taverna da orla precisa de ajuda. Aposto que eles têm uma grande seleção lá!
column2: Heya! The Seafront tavern's in need of assistance.<LF>I bet they've got quite a selection over there!
column3: Heya! The Seafront tavern's in need of assistance.<LF>I bet they've got quite a selection over there!

column1: O dono da taverna em Orla quer falar com você sobre um novo prato. Você está se tornando uma pequena celebridade.
column2: The tavern keeper in Seafront wants to talk to you about a new dish. You're really becoming quite the little celebrity.
column3: The tavern keeper in Seafront wants to talk to you about a new dish. You're really becoming quite the little celebrity.

column1: Entrega especial! De você, para Facade. Parece bom? A propósito, como você entrou nesse lugar?
column2: Special delivery! From you, to Facade. Sound good?<LF>By the way, how'd you even get in that place?
column3: Special delivery! From you, to Facade. Sound good?<LF>By the way, how'd you even get in that place?

column1: Eu tenho um trabalho de Facade, acabadinho de sair do forno! Você certamente conhece muitas pessoas, não é mesmo? Você é uma pessoa influente e ativa, Nier!
column2: I've got a job from Facade, fresh off the grill!<LF>You certainly know a lot of people, don't you? You're a real mover and shaker, <NIER>!
column3: I've got a job from Facade, fresh off the grill!<LF>You certainly know a lot of people, don't you? You're a real mover and shaker, <NIER>!

column1: Alguém de Facade pediu sua ajuda. ... Eles são difíceis de lidar? Porque parecem ser completos malucos.
column2: Someone in Facade asked for your help.<LF>...Are they tough to deal with? Because they seem like total weirdos.
column3: Someone in Facade asked for your help.<LF>...Are they tough to deal with? Because they seem like total weirdos.

column1: Facade está procurando ajuda novamente. O rei precisa de materiais para algo. ... E ele é um rei, então é melhor você ir agora!
column2: Facade's looking for help again.<LF>The king needs materials for something. ...And he's a king, so you better hop to it!
column3: Facade's looking for help again.<LF>The king needs materials for something. ...And he's a king, so you better hop to it!

column1: Espera, o que diabos? Sério? Ok, então... Aparentemente, alguém em Facade quer que você conserte seu casamento quebrado.
column2: Wait, what the heck? Seriously? Okay, so...<LF>Apparently someone in Facade wants you to fix his broken marriage.
column3: Wait, what the heck? Seriously? Okay, so...<LF>Apparently someone in Facade wants you to fix his broken marriage.

column1: Um residente de Facade está procurando ajuda. É sobre flores, ou algo assim.
column2: A Facade resident is looking for help.<LF>It's about flowers, or something like that.
column3: A Facade resident is looking for help.<LF>It's about flowers, or something like that.

column1: O dono da taverna em Beira-mar precisa da sua ajuda. Acho que ele está procurando por comida novamente. ... O cara deve estar realmente com fome!
column2: The tavern keeper in Seafront needs your help.<LF>I think he's looking for food again. ...Guy must be really hungry!
column3: The tavern keeper in Seafront needs your help.<LF>I think he's looking for food again. ...Guy must be really hungry!

column1: Quer ajudar o ferreiro da vila? Hmm... Eu não tenho muita informação. O pedido é um pouco vago.
column2: Wanna help out the village blacksmith?<LF>Um...I don't have much. The request is a bit vague.
column3: Wanna help out the village blacksmith?<LF>Um...I don't have much. The request is a bit vague.

column1: Recebi uma solicitação do governo de Facade! Você é como nosso embaixador da cidade ou algo assim!
column2: I got a request from the government of Facade!<LF>You're like our town's ambassador or something!
column3: I got a request from the government of Facade!<LF>You're like our town's ambassador or something!

column1: Ah, Yonah está procurando ajuda. É melhor fazer disso uma prioridade absoluta, senhor!
column2: Oh hey, Yonah's looking for help.<LF>Better make it a top priority, mister!
column3: Oh hey, Yonah's looking for help.<LF>Better make it a top priority, mister!

column1: Um morador de Beira-mar tem uma carta para você entregar. <LF>Talvez seja melhor você se tornar um carteiro?
column2: A Seafront resident has a letter for you to deliver.<LF>Maybe you should just become a postman?
column3: A Seafront resident has a letter for you to deliver.<LF>Maybe you should just become a postman?

column1: Alguém perdeu seu cachorro. <LF>...Nenhum trabalho é pequeno demais, né?
column2: Someone lost their dog.<LF>...No job too small, huh?
column3: Someone lost their dog.<LF>...No job too small, huh?

column1: Algum cara em Beira-mar quer se tornar um grande negociante. <LF>O que quer que funcione, suponho. Ele está esperando no porto ali.
column2: Some guy in Seafront wants to become a big-time trader.<LF>Whatever works, I guess. He's waiting by the port over there.
column3: Some guy in Seafront wants to become a big-time trader.<LF>Whatever works, I guess. He's waiting by the port over there.

column1: Eu ouvi de um homem que quer que você encontre seu filho. <LF>É um pouco estranho, porém, porque o garoto é na verdade um homem adulto.
column2: I heard from a man who wants you to track down his son.<LF>It's a little weird, though, 'cause the kid is actually a grown man.
column3: I heard from a man who wants you to track down his son.<LF>It's a little weird, though, 'cause the kid is actually a grown man.

column1: Oh, irmão. Essa aqui é rica. <LF>Algum cara quer dar um presente para uma mulher e precisa da sua ajuda.
column2: Oh, brother. This one's rich.<LF>Some guy wants to give a gift to a woman, and he needs your help.
column3: Oh, brother. This one's rich.<LF>Some guy wants to give a gift to a woman, and he needs your help.

column1: Alguma pobre menina desapareceu em Facade. <LF>Você deveria ir para lá imediatamente e ajudá-los.
column2: Some poor girl's gone missing in Facade.<LF>You should get over there right away and help them out.
column3: Some poor girl's gone missing in Facade.<LF>You should get over there right away and help them out.

column1: Facade precisa que você acabe com alguns bandidos. <LF>Já era hora de eles te darem algum trabalho de verdade!
column2: Facade needs you to put the hurt on some bandits. <LF>It's about time they gave you some real work!
column3: Facade needs you to put the hurt on some bandits. <LF>It's about time they gave you some real work!

column1: Quer ir para o Beira-mar? Eu recebi um pedido de uma senhora lá. Na verdade, é mais uma exigência... Quem me dera poder mandar nas pessoas assim!
column2: Wanna go to Seafront? I've got a request from a lady there.<LF>Actually, it's more like a demand. ...Wish I could boss people around like this!
column3: Wanna go to Seafront? I've got a request from a lady there.<LF>Actually, it's more like a demand. ...Wish I could boss people around like this!

column1: Parece que há um viajante em Beira-mar que está procurando por algo. Por que você não vai ver o que ela quer?
column2: Seems like there's a traveler in Seafront who's searching for something. <LF>Why don't you go see what she wants?
column3: Seems like there's a traveler in Seafront who's searching for something. <LF>Why don't you go see what she wants?

column1: Adivinha só? É outro trabalho da Facade. Um jovem homem... E é só isso que sei.
column2: Guess what? It's another job from Facade.<LF>Some young man. ...And that's all I know.
column3: Guess what? It's another job from Facade.<LF>Some young man. ...And that's all I know.

column1: Recebi um pedido aqui de um comerciante que está tendo problemas com ladrões. Malditos ladrões! Vá lá e dê uma lição neles!
column2: Got a request here from a shopkeeper who's having trouble with thieves.<LF>...Stupid thieves! Go give 'em what-for!
column3: Got a request here from a shopkeeper who's having trouble with thieves.<LF>...Stupid thieves! Go give 'em what-for!

column1: Aquele comerciante em Beira-mar tem outro pedido. Bem, ele é mais um comerciante em potencial, eu acho. De qualquer forma, ele pode te informar.
column2: That trader in Seafront has another request.<LF>Well, he's more of a would-be trader, I guess. ...Anyway, he can fill you in.
column3: That trader in Seafront has another request.<LF>Well, he's more of a would-be trader, I guess. ...Anyway, he can fill you in.

column1: A esposa de um dos lojistas da vila precisa de ajuda. Acho que o filho dela está realmente doente. Provavelmente não preciso te perguntar duas vezes sobre isso, né?
column2: The wife of one of the village shopkeepers needs help. I guess her kid is really sick. <LF>...I probably don't need to ask you twice about this one, huh?
column3: The wife of one of the village shopkeepers needs help. I guess her kid is really sick. <LF>...I probably don't need to ask you twice about this one, huh?

column1: Há uma mulher aqui na vila procurando por seu namorado. Ela deveria apenas procurar por si mesma! ... Mas ei, ela está pagando, então eu vou me calar.
column2: There's a woman here in the village looking for her boyfriend.<LF>She should just go look for herself! ...But hey, she's paying, so I'll shut up.
column3: There's a woman here in the village looking for her boyfriend.<LF>She should just go look for herself! ...But hey, she's paying, so I'll shut up.

column1: Parece que há um homem procurando por um talher bastante exclusivo. Ele diz que pagará o que for preciso. ... Oooo! Que emocionante!
column2: Seems there's a man looking for a rather unique piece of cutlery.<LF>He says he'll pay whatever it takes. ...Oooo! How exciting!
column3: Seems there's a man looking for a rather unique piece of cutlery.<LF>He says he'll pay whatever it takes. ...Oooo! How exciting!

column1: Consegui um trabalho de Beira-mar se você não estiver muito ocupado. É um cara... Procurando por algo... Olha, vá perguntar a ele, tudo bem?
column2: Got a job from Seafront if you aren't too busy.<LF>It's a guy... Looking for something... Look, just go ask him, all right?
column3: Got a job from Seafront if you aren't too busy.<LF>It's a guy... Looking for something... Look, just go ask him, all right?

column1: Aquele mordomo da mansão precisa da sua ajuda. Com certeza você mantém algumas companhias estranhas...
column2: That butler from the manor needs your help.<LF>You sure do keep some strange company...
column3: That butler from the manor needs your help.<LF>You sure do keep some strange company...

column1: Aparentemente há Sombras na vila? Eeeek! Bem!? Não fique aí parado! Vá cuidar deles!
column2: Apparently there're Shades in the village? Eeeek!<LF>Well!? Don't just stand there! Go take care of 'em!
column3: Apparently there're Shades in the village? Eeeek!<LF>Well!? Don't just stand there! Go take care of 'em!

column1: O florista em Beira-Mar tem um trabalho para você. Apenas uma entrega simples. Fácil-fácil.
column2: The florist in Seafront has a job for you.<LF>Just a simple delivery. Easy-peasy.
column3: The florist in Seafront has a job for you.<LF>Just a simple delivery. Easy-peasy.

column1: Alguém na Floresta dos Mitos queria sua ajuda.<LF>Estranho - eu raramente recebo pedidos desse lugar.
column2: Someone in the Forest of Myth wanted your assistance.<LF>Strange—I hardly ever get requests from that place.
column3: Someone in the Forest of Myth wanted your assistance.<LF>Strange—I hardly ever get requests from that place.

column1: Um aldeão foi atacado por Sombras nas planícies do norte.<LF>Você pode ir perguntar a ele sobre isso? Pode ser algo que devamos investigar.
column2: A villager was attacked by Shades in the northern plains.<LF>Can you go ask him about it? It may be something we should look into.
column3: A villager was attacked by Shades in the northern plains.<LF>Can you go ask him about it? It may be something we should look into.

column1: Um carteiro quer que você se livre de algumas Sombras.<LF>Está ficando bastante perigoso por aqui ultimamente.
column2: A postman wants you to get rid of some Shades.<LF>It's getting pretty dangerous around here lately.
column3: A postman wants you to get rid of some Shades.<LF>It's getting pretty dangerous around here lately.

column1: Aparentemente, o mordomo da mansão tem uma Sombra "única" e quer sua opinião sobre ela.<LF>Sim, não olhe para mim.
column2: Apparently the manor's butler has a "unique" Shade he wants your advice on.<LF>Yeah, don't look at me.
column3: Apparently the manor's butler has a "unique" Shade he wants your advice on.<LF>Yeah, don't look at me.

column1: Ei, há um estudioso em Beira-Mar que perguntou sobre você.<LF>Eu acho que ele precisa de ajuda com pesquisa histórica?
column2: Hey, there's a scholar in Seafront who asked about you.<LF>I guess he needs help with historical research?
column3: Hey, there's a scholar in Seafront who asked about you.<LF>I guess he needs help with historical research?

column1: Outro cara em Facade precisava da sua ajuda com alguma coisa.<LF>Eu digo, se não fosse por você, toda aquela cidade simplesmente se desmoronaria.
column2: Another guy in Facade wanted your help with something.<LF>I tell ya, if it wasn't for you, that whole city would just fall apart.
column3: Another guy in Facade wanted your help with something.<LF>I tell ya, if it wasn't for you, that whole city would just fall apart.

column1: Recebi uma carta do rei de Facade. Ele precisa que você resolva um "problema". Fico pensando o que poderia ser?
column2: I got a letter from the king of Facade.<LF>He needs you to deal with an "issue." Wonder what that's about?
column3: I got a letter from the king of Facade.<LF>He needs you to deal with an "issue." Wonder what that's about?

column1: Um dos aldeões está tendo problemas com um javali selvagem. Esses javalis podem ser muito difíceis de lidar. Talvez você pudesse ajudar?
column2: One of the villagers is having problems with a wild boar.<LF>Those boars can be a real handful. Maybe you could help out?
column3: One of the villagers is having problems with a wild boar.<LF>Those boars can be a real handful. Maybe you could help out?

column1: Recebi um trabalho do carteiro em Beira-Mar. Ele precisa da sua ajuda com um assunto pessoal.
column2: I've got a job from the postman in Seafront.<LF>He needs your help with a personal matter.

column1: Querido <NIER>,<LF><LF>Espero que esteja indo bem. Eu estou bem aqui, embora às vezes fique um pouco solitária. Mas sempre que isso acontece, eu olho para o céu e me pergunto se é da mesma cor onde você está também.<LF>Isso geralmente me faz sentir melhor.<LF><LF>Não pegue um resfriado, tá bom?<LF><LF>Yonah
column2: Dear <NIER>,<LF><LF>I hope you're doing okay. I'm doing fine here, though it gets kind of lonely sometimes. But whenever that happens, I just look up at the sky and wonder if it's the same color wherever you are, too.<LF>That usually makes me feel better.<LF><LF>Don't catch cold, okay?<LF><LF>Yonah
column3: Dear <NIER>,<LF><LF>I hope you're doing okay. I'm doing fine here, though it gets kind of lonely sometimes. But whenever that happens, I just look up at the sky and wonder if it's the same color wherever you are, too.<LF>That usually makes me feel better.<LF><LF>Don't catch cold, okay?<LF><LF>Yonah

column1: Querido <NIER>,<LF><LF>Estou preocupada com você. Você gasta toda sua energia se concentrando em minha doença e sempre que penso em como você está chateado, me deixa um pouco triste.<LF><LF>Gostaria que você desacelerasse um pouco e não se preocupasse comigo, porque ver você sofrendo é muito pior do que esse estúpido Rabisco Negro. Eu sei que parece estranho, mas é a verdade.<LF><LF>Yonah
column2: Dear <NIER>,<LF><LF>I'm worried about you. You spend all your energy focusing on my disease, and whenever I think about how upset you are, it makes me kind of sad.<LF><LF>I wish you'd slow down a little and not worry about me, because seeing you in pain is way worse than this stupid Black Scrawl. I know that sounds weird, but it's the truth.<LF><LF>Yonah
column3: Dear <NIER>,<LF><LF>I'm worried about you. You spend all your energy focusing on my disease, and whenever I think about how upset you are, it makes me kind of sad.<LF><LF>I wish you'd slow down a little and not worry about me, because seeing you in pain is way worse than this stupid Black Scrawl. I know that sounds weird, but it's the truth.<LF><LF>Yonah

column1: Querido <NIER>,<LF><LF>Hoje foi incrível! Popola me fez um bolo ENORME que estava realmente gostoso, e todo mundo na vila tem me desejado feliz aniversário. É divertido! Eu me sinto como uma princesa ou algo assim.<LF><LF>Eu não me sinto doente hoje. Na verdade, eu quase esqueci que tenho essa doença!<LF>Então talvez você possa esquecer também e voltar para casa agora?<LF><LF>Yonah
column2: Dear <NIER>,<LF><LF>Today was awesome! Popola made me this HUGE cake that was really yummy, and everyone in the village has been wishing me happy birthday. It's fun! I feel like a princess or something.<LF><LF>I don't feel sick at all today. In fact, I almost forgot I had this disease!<LF>So maybe you can forget about it too and come back home now? <LF><LF>Yonah
column3: Dear <NIER>,<LF><LF>Today was awesome! Popola made me this HUGE cake that was really yummy, and everyone in the village has been wishing me happy birthday. It's fun! I feel like a princess or something.<LF><LF>I don't feel sick at all today. In fact, I almost forgot I had this disease!<LF>So maybe you can forget about it too and come back home now? <LF><LF>Yonah

column1: Minha querida amada,<LF><LF>Por favor, perdoe a demora desta carta. Eu recentemente fiquei doente,<LF>e tive dificuldade em encontrar um médico nesta terra estrangeira.<LF>As pessoas aqui, no entanto, têm me tratado com grande gentileza,<LF>e agora sinto meu corpo ficar mais forte a cada dia.<LF>Se minha recuperação continuar, espero tentar a jornada de volta para casa em breve.<LF><LF>Penso em você todos os dias e anseio pelo momento em que podemos estar juntos novamente. Por favor, cuide de si mesma e saiba que estou fazendo tudo o que posso para voltar para você.
column2: My dearest beloved,<LF><LF>Please forgive the lateness of this letter. I have recently fallen quite ill,<LF>and had some difficulty finding a doctor in this foreign land.<LF>The people here, however, have treated me with great kindness,<LF>and I now feel my body getting stronger by the day.<LF>If my recovery continues, I hope to attempt the journey home soon. <LF><LF>I think about you every day, and yearn for the moment when we can be together again. Please take care of yourself, and know that I am doing everything I can to return to you.
column3: My dearest beloved,<LF><LF>Please forgive the lateness of this letter. I have recently fallen quite ill,<LF>and had some difficulty finding a doctor in this foreign land.<LF>The people here, however, have treated me with great kindness,<LF>and I now feel my body getting stronger by the day.<LF>If my recovery continues, I hope to attempt the journey home soon. <LF><LF>I think about you every day, and yearn for the moment when we can be together again. Please take care of yourself, and know that I am doing everything I can to return to you.

column1: Minha mais amada,<LF><LF>Novamente eu ponho a caneta no papel quando tudo o que desejo é ver você com meus próprios olhos. Como estão seus dias? Eu estou indo bem o suficiente. Minha doença é teimosa, mas meu amor por você é mais forte! Apenas saber que você está me esperando é o suficiente para me manter indo.<LF><LF>Eu sei como você deve estar solitária, mas devo dizer isso novamente: Não tente me encontrar. A viagem é traiçoeira e a doença corre solta nesta terra. Se algo acontecesse com você, temo que não seria capaz de suportar. <LF><LF>Meu amor. Meu mais amado amor. Eu voltarei para você em breve.
column2: My dearest beloved,<LF><LF>Again I put pen to paper when all I desire is to see you with my own eyes. How do the days find you? I am faring well enough. My illness is stubborn, but my love for you is stronger! Just knowing that you wait for me is enough to keep me going. <LF><LF>I know how lonely you must be, but I must say this again: Do not attempt to find me. The voyage is treacherous, and disease runs rampant in this land. If anything were to happen to you, I fear I would not be able to take it. <LF><LF>My love. My dearest love. I will return to you soon.
column3: My dearest beloved,<LF><LF>Again I put pen to paper when all I desire is to see you with my own eyes. How do the days find you? I am faring well enough. My illness is stubborn, but my love for you is stronger! Just knowing that you wait for me is enough to keep me going. <LF><LF>I know how lonely you must be, but I must say this again: Do not attempt to find me. The voyage is treacherous, and disease runs rampant in this land. If anything were to happen to you, I fear I would not be able to take it. <LF><LF>My love. My dearest love. I will return to you soon.

column1: Minha amada mais querida,<LF><LF>Cinquenta anos se passaram desde que olhei pela última vez em seu rosto. Como isso é possível? Quando nos encontrarmos novamente, espero que você possa olhar além das rugas de um homem velho e ver uma alma tão jovem quanto o dia em que nos conhecemos.<LF><LF>Este passa tempo me fez pensar em nossos dias anteriores. Quando nos conhecemos, você era a garota mais bonita da cidade. Sua beleza foi o que primeiro me atraiu para você, mas foi seu coração gentil que prendeu minha alma.<LF>Me alegra ler suas cartas, pois posso ver nelas que seu espírito<LF>é tão maravilhoso quanto sempre. <LF><LF>Obrigado aos deuses todos os dias por termos nos apaixonados, mesmo enquanto os amaldiçoo por nos manterem separados. Vou te ver novamente. Espere por mim, meu amor.
column2: My dearest beloved,<LF><LF>Fifty years have passed since I last gazed upon your face. How is it possible? When next we meet, I hope you can look past the wrinkles of an old man and see into a soul as young as the day we first met.<LF><LF>This passage of time has led me to think upon our earlier days. When we first met, you were the prettiest girl in town. Your beauty was what first attracted me to you, but it was your kind heart which ensnared my soul.<LF>It gladdens me to read your letters, for I can see in them that your spirit<LF>is as wonderful as ever. <LF><LF>I thank the gods each day that we fell in love, even as I curse them for keeping us apart. I will see you again. Wait for me, my love.
column3: My dearest beloved,<LF><LF>Fifty years have passed since I last gazed upon your face. How is it possible? When next we meet, I hope you can look past the wrinkles of an old man and see into a soul as young as the day we first met.<LF><LF>This passage of time has led me to think upon our earlier days. When we first met, you were the prettiest girl in town. Your beauty was what first attracted me to you, but it was your kind heart which ensnared my soul.<LF>It gladdens me to read your letters, for I can see in them that your spirit<LF>is as wonderful as ever. <LF><LF>I thank the gods each day that we fell in love, even as I curse them for keeping us apart. I will see you again. Wait for me, my love.

column1: Querida Popola,<LF><LF>Espero que esta carta encontre você bem.<LF><LF>Estou escrevendo na esperança de chamar sua atenção para um certo problema de sonho preocupante relacionado a eventos recentes na vila dos sonhos. Eu estava esperando poder obter seu conselho sobre o assunto.<LF><LF>Recentemente, houve relatos de sonhos, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho mau, sonho, sonho vazio, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho mau, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, palavras, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho, sonho

column1: Querido <NIER>,<LF><LF>Eu sei que não falamos há um tempo, e sinto muito que a minha primeira comunicação seja um apelo à ajuda, mas estou no limite aqui. <LF><LF> Eu tenho uma carta importante que precisa ser entregue para a mulher do farol, mas os problemas na minha perna impedem que eu a leve até ela.<LF> Pedi ajuda aos meus colegas carteiro de outras cidades, mas todos alegam estar ocupados. (Pessoalmente, acho que todos eles têm medo da mulher...e não posso culpá-los!)<LF><LF>Você é a única pessoa que eu consigo pensar que pode enfrentá-la. Você poderia vir e me ajudar? Isso significaria mais do que você pode imaginar.
column2: Dear <NIER>,<LF><LF>I know we haven't spoken in a while, and I'm sorry that my first communication is a plea for help, but I'm at my wit's end here.<LF><LF>I have an important letter that must be delivered to the woman in the lighthouse, but the issues with my leg prevent me from bringing it to her.<LF>I have asked my fellow postmen from other towns to help me, but they all claim to be too busy. (Personally, I think they're all just scared of the woman...and I suppose I can't blame them!)<LF><LF>You are the only person I can think of who can stand up to her. Will you please come and help me? It would mean more than you can know.
column3: Dear <NIER>,<LF><LF>I know we haven't spoken in a while, and I'm sorry that my first communication is a plea for help, but I'm at my wit's end here.<LF><LF>I have an important letter that must be delivered to the woman in the lighthouse, but the issues with my leg prevent me from bringing it to her.<LF>I have asked my fellow postmen from other towns to help me, but they all claim to be too busy. (Personally, I think they're all just scared of the woman...and I suppose I can't blame them!)<LF><LF>You are the only person I can think of who can stand up to her. Will you please come and help me? It would mean more than you can know.

column1: Caro <NIER>,<LF><LF>Você tem sido fantástico! Se eu achasse que você estivesse interessado, eu o tornaria um entregador de correio adjunto na hora! Mas tenho certeza de que você tem assuntos mais importantes para tratar.<LF><LF>Você pode vir ao correio em Beira-Mar? Eu sei que é um pouco longe,<LF>mas tenho algo para você como agradecimento, e eu gostaria de entregá-lo pessoalmente.
column2: Dear <NIER>,<LF><LF>You've been fantastic! If I thought you were interested, I'd make you a<LF>deputy postman on the spot! But I'm sure you have more important<LF>matters to attend to.<LF><LF>Can you come to the post office in Seafront? I know it's a bit of a trek,<LF>but I have something for you in the way of a thank-you, and I would<LF>like to deliver it in person.
column3: Dear <NIER>,<LF><LF>You've been fantastic! If I thought you were interested, I'd make you a<LF>deputy postman on the spot! But I'm sure you have more important<LF>matters to attend to.<LF><LF>Can you come to the post office in Seafront? I know it's a bit of a trek,<LF>but I have something for you in the way of a thank-you, and I would<LF>like to deliver it in person.

column1: Meu caro senhor,<LF><LF>Você não me conhece, mas tenha certeza de que eu conheço você. Histórias de suas aventuras se espalharam por todo o país, trazendo esperança até mesmo aos cantos mais obscuros. Imagine alguém forte o suficiente para enfrentar as Sombras! Só de pensar nisso, meu coração acelera.<LF><LF>Eu sei que isso parece repentino, mas ficaria imensamente grato se você pudesse me fazer uma visita. Sou o proprietário de um humilde casarão localizado nas planícies do sul, mas garanto que minha hospitalidade é incomparável!<LF><LF>Por favor, reflita sobre minha oferta. Aguardo ansiosamente por conhecê-lo.
column2: My good sir,<LF><LF>You do not know me, but rest assured, I know of you. Tales of your exploits have spread far and wide across the land, bringing hope to even the darkest corners. Imagine, someone strong enough to stand against the Shades! It makes my heart race just to think of it.<LF><LF>I know this seems sudden, but I would be most appreciative if you could pay me a visit. I am the owner of a humble manor located in the southern plains, but I promise you, my hospitality is second to none! <LF><LF>Please think upon my offer. I look forward to meeting you.

I am the owner of a humble manor located in the southern plains, but I promise you, my hospitality is second to none! <LF><LF>Please think upon my offer. I look forward to meeting you.

column1: *AVISO IMPORTANTE*<LF><LF>Cumprimentos da Armamento dos Dois Irmãos!<LF>Esperamos que todos os nossos leais clientes estejam bem.<LF><LF>Estamos felizes em anunciar que a poeira baixou e nossas<LF>renovações estão concluídas! Nossa nova loja abre hoje,<LF>com ainda mais ótimas maneiras de servir o ocupado caçador de sombras!<LF><LF>Pedimos desculpas por qualquer inconveniente causado pelo nosso longo fechamento,<LF>e esperamos vê-lo em breve.
column2: *IMPORTANT NOTICE*<LF><LF>Greetings from Two Brothers Weaponry!<LF>We hope that all of our loyal customers are doing well. <LF><LF>We're pleased to announce that the dust has settled, and our<LF>renovations are now complete! Our new store is opening today,<LF>with even more great ways to serve the busy Shade hunter!<LF><LF>We apologize for any inconvenience caused by our lengthy closure,<LF>and we hope to see you soon.

Our new store is opening today,<LF>with even more great ways to serve the busy Shade hunter!<LF><LF>We apologize for any inconvenience caused by our lengthy closure,<LF>and we hope to see you soon.

column1: Aviso Oficial<LF><LF>Conforme a Regra 25.656, considere esta a sua notificação oficial de que o rei de Facade escolheu entrar no casamento.<LF>Por favor, apresente todas as objeções e/ou congratulações pelos canais oficiais indicados na Regra 38.585.<LF><LF>Sinceramente,<LF><LF>O Escritório Real de Casamento e Outros Contratos e Preocupações Legalmente Vinculantes de Facade<LF><LF>PS: Ei, pessoal, sou eu! O rei de Facade! Desculpe por toda essa formalidade. Ouça, vou me casar e realmente quero que você venha!<LF>...Então venha para cá!
column2: Official Notice <LF><LF>As per Rule 25,656, please consider this your official notice that the king<LF>of Facade has chosen to enter into the ceremony of matrimony.<LF>Please lodge all objections and/or congratulations through the<LF>official channels stated in Rule 38,585.<LF><LF>Sincerely,<LF><LF>The Facade Royal Office of Marriage and Other Legally Binding<LF>Contracts and Concerns<LF><LF>PS: Hey, guys, it's me! column1: Caro <NIER><LF><LF>Isso pode parecer repentino, mas vou deixar a cidade em breve. Tenho algumas coisas que preciso resolver em minha cabeça e não acho que possa fazer isso aqui. <LF><LF>Se algo acontecer comigo, gostaria que você cuidasse dos meus assuntos pessoais. Ah, e não mencionei isso ao meu orientador porque queria lhe contar primeiro. Então, se ele parecer realmente surpreso, é por isso.<LF><LF>Até breve,<LF><LF>-O rei de Facade
column2: Dear <NIER><LF><LF>This is going to sound sudden, but I'm leaving the city soon. I have some things I need to get straight in my head, and I don't think I can do so here.<LF><LF>If anything happens to me, I'd like you to take care of my personal affairs. Oh, and I haven't mentioned this to my advisor because I wanted to tell you first. So if he seems really surprised, that's why.<LF><LF>See you soon,<LF><LF>—The king of Facade
column3: Dear <NIER><LF><LF>This is going to sound sudden, but I'm leaving the city soon. Oh, and I haven't mentioned this to my advisor because I wanted to tell you first. So if he seems really surprised, that's why.<LF><LF>See you soon,<LF><LF>—The king of Facade

column1: Aviso: Armazenamento Arquivístico 8.2.2026<LF><LF>Seguindo o recente incidente com o Número 6, decidimos estabelecer uma sala de arquivamento. Esta sala armazenará registros sobre os métodos usados para controlar e/ou cancelar todas as formas de magia - incluindo petrificação e transformação bestial - bem como permitir que outros projetos avancem. (Especificamente, isso deverá facilitar a conclusão de uma solução de armazenamento de longo prazo para o Número 6, bem como prosseguir com o nosso trabalho no Número 7.)<LF><LF>Todos os funcionários são obrigados a manter a entrada do pátio desta nova sala segura. A falta de cumprimento disso é considerada motivo para demissão imediata.
column2: Notice: Archival Storage   8.2.2026<LF><LF>Following the recent incident with Number 6, we have decided to establish an archival room. This room will hold records on the methods used to control and/or cancel all forms of magic—including petrification and bestial transformation—as well as allow other projects to move forward. (Specifically, this should make it easier to complete a long-term storage solution for Number 6, as well as proceed with our work on Number 7.)<LF><LF>All employees are required to keep the courtyard entrance to this new room secure. Failure to do so is considered grounds for immediate termination.
column3: Notice: Archival Storage   8.2.2026<LF><LF>Following the recent incident with Number 6, we have decided to establish an archival room. This room will hold records on the methods used to control and/or cancel all forms of magic—including petrification and bestial transformation—as well as allow other projects to move forward. (Specifically, this should make it easier to complete a long-term storage solution for Number 6, as well as proceed with our work on Number 7.)<LF><LF>All employees are required to keep the courtyard entrance to this new room secure. Failure to do so is considered grounds for immediate termination.

column1: Aviso: Relatório de Progresso sobre o Número 6 12.25.2025<LF><LF>Finalizamos a pesquisa inicial sobre o Número 6 e estamos prontos para iniciar o experimento inicial nos próximos dias.<LF><LF>Como isso provavelmente marcará um grande avanço na pesquisa Gestalt, o Laboratório Nacional de Pesquisa de Armas tornou a conclusão do projeto Número 6 sua principal prioridade. Os orçamentos para todos os outros projetos devem ser congelados imediatamente.
column2: Notice: Progress Report on Number 6   12.25.2025<LF><LF>We have completed the initial research into Number 6, and are ready to initiate the startup experiment in the coming days.<LF><LF>As this will likely mark a great leap forward in Gestalt research, the National Weapons Research Laboratory has made the completion of the Number 6 project its top priority. Budgets for all other projects are to be frozen, effective immediately.
column3: Notice: Progress Report on Number 6   12.25.2025<LF><LF>We have completed the initial research into Number 6, and are ready to initiate the startup experiment in the coming days.<LF><LF>As this will likely mark a great leap forward in Gestalt research, the National Weapons Research Laboratory has made the completion of the Number 6 project its top priority. Budgets for all other projects are to be frozen, effective immediately.

column1: Aviso: Pauta da Reunião 9.12.2026<LF><LF>A reunião de hoje abordará os seguintes tópicos:<LF>- Uma solução para o armazenamento de longo prazo do Número 6.<LF>- Um relatório de progresso sobre o Número 7.<LF>- Disfarçando as instalações do laboratório acima do solo como uma mansão.
column2: Notice: Meeting Agenda   9.12.2026<LF><LF>Today's meeting will address the following topics:<LF>- A solution for long-term storage of Number 6.<LF>- A progress report on Number 7.<LF>- Disguising the laboratory's above-ground facility as a mansion.
column3: Notice: Meeting Agenda   9.12.2026<LF><LF>Today's meeting will address the following topics:<LF>- A solution for long-term storage of Number 6.<LF>- A progress report on Number 7.<LF>- Disguising the laboratory's above-ground facility as a mansion.

column1: Aviso: Relatório de Progresso sobre o Número 6 10.11.2025<LF><LF>O corpo do doador Halua foi escolhido entre os sete candidatos para prosseguir para a próxima etapa. No interesse de proteger segredos de estado, todos os outros sujeitos restantes serão eliminados. O corpo do doador Emil, no entanto, será mantido em armazenamento como uma medida de backup.
column2: Notice: Progress Report on Number 6   10.11.2025<LF><LF>The donor body Halua has been chosen from among the seven candidate subjects to proceed to the next stage. In the interest of protecting state secrets, all but one of the remaining subjects will be disposed of. The donor body Emil, however, will be kept in storage as a failsafe measure.
column3: Notice: Progress Report on Number 6   10.11.2025<LF><LF>The donor body Halua has been chosen from among the seven candidate subjects to proceed to the next stage. In the interest of protecting state secrets, all but one of the remaining subjects will be disposed of. The donor body Emil, however, will be kept in storage as a failsafe measure.

column1: De: O Gabinete do Prefeito de Beira-mar<LF>Para: O Chefe de Aerie<LF><LF>Espero que minha carta encontre você em bom espírito. Dito isso, eu não recebi<LF>correspondência de sua vila há algum tempo. Está tudo bem?<LF>Nossos comerciantes perderam contato com seus clientes em sua<LF>cidade justa, e isso nos preocupa muito.<LF><LF>Como você sabe, a atividade da Sombra tem aumentado ultimamente, o que faz<LF>nós tememos pela segurança de Aerie - especialmente desde que as criaturas vis<LF>parecem se sentir atraídas de maneira incomum por sua área. Por favor, deixe-nos saber se há<LF>algo que as pessoas de Beira-mar possam fazer para ajudar na luta contra<LF>esse inimigo comum.
column2: From: The Office of the Mayor of Seafront<LF>To: The Chief of The Aerie<LF><LF>I hope my letter finds you in good spirits. That said, I have not received<LF>correspondence from your village in some time. Is everything well?<LF>Our merchants have lost contact with their customers from your<LF>fair town, and this disquiets all of us greatly.<LF><LF>As you know, Shade activity has been on the rise as of late, and this makes<LF>us fear for the safety of The Aerie—especially since the foul creatures<LF>seem unusually attracted to your area. Please let us know if there is<LF>anything that the people of Seafront can do to help in the fight against<LF>this common enemy.
column3: From: The Office of the Mayor of Seafront<LF>To: The Chief of The Aerie<LF><LF>I hope my letter finds you in good spirits. That said, I have not received<LF>correspondence from your village in some time. Is everything well?<LF>Our merchants have lost contact with their customers from your<LF>fair town, and this disquiets all of us greatly.<LF><LF>As you know, Shade activity has been on the rise as of late, and this makes<LF>us fear for the safety of The Aerie—especially since the foul creatures<LF>seem unusually attracted to your area. Please let us know if there is<LF>anything that the people of Seafront can do to help in the fight against<LF>this common enemy.

column1: Para: Armamento dos Dois Irmãos<LF><LF>Nós gostaríamos de estender nossos sinceros agradecimentos em relação à nossa recente transação comercial. Esperamos que vocês nos perdoem por nossa reação inicial quando soubemos da juventude de vocês. Essas preocupações se mostraram totalmente infundadas, visto que os metais que recebemos eram de excelente qualidade. Não poderíamos estar mais satisfeitos com o pedido!<LF><LF>Esperamos continuar fazendo negócios no futuro.<LF><LF>A Empresa Beira-Mar, Divisão de Comércio
column2: To: Two Brothers Weaponry<LF><LF>Allow us to extend our heartfelt thanks regarding our recent business transaction. We hope you will forgive our initial reaction when we learned of your youth. Such worries have proven to be totally unfounded, as the metals we received were all of the utmost quality. We could not be more satisfied with the order!<LF><LF>We hope to continue doing business in the future.<LF><LF>The Seafront Company, Trade Division
column3: To: Two Brothers Weaponry<LF><LF>Allow us to extend our heartfelt thanks regarding our recent business transaction. We hope you will forgive our initial reaction when we learned of your youth. Such worries have proven to be totally unfounded, as the metals we received were all of the utmost quality. We could not be more satisfied with the order!<LF><LF>We hope to continue doing business in the future.<LF><LF>The Seafront Company, Trade Division

column1: De: Escritório do Prefeito de Beira-Mar<LF>Para: Popola<LF><LF>Escrevo-lhe sobre a questão urgente de Aerie. Como você sabe, a atividade de Sombras nessa área aumentou muito ultimamente, e agora tememos o pior. Inúmeras cartas ao chefe da vila ainda não foram respondidas, e nossos comerciantes recentemente perderam todo contato com os clientes lá.<LF><LF>Embora Beira-Mar ainda não tenha sido incomodada pelas Sombras, tememos que sua chegada seja apenas uma questão de tempo. Encorajo sua vila a tomar todas as medidas necessárias para se defender dessa terrível praga; a perda de dois postos avançados seria quase demais para suportar.<LF><LF>Espero ouvir de você em breve.
column2: From: The Office of the Mayor of Seafront<LF>To: Popola<LF><LF>I write to you regarding the urgent matter of The Aerie. As you know, Shade activity in that area has been much increased of late, and we now fear the worst. Numerous letters to the village chief have yet to be returned, and our merchants have recently lost all contact with customers there.<LF><LF>While Seafront has yet to be troubled by the Shades, we fear their arrival is only a matter of time. I encourage your village to take all necessary steps to defend yourself from this terrible scourge; the loss of two outposts would be almost too much to bear.<LF><LF>I hope to hear from you soon.
column3: From: The Office of the Mayor of Seafront<LF>To: Popola<LF><LF>I write to you regarding the urgent matter of The Aerie. As you know, Shade activity in that area has been much increased of late, and we now fear the worst. Numerous letters to the village chief have yet to be returned, and our merchants have recently lost all contact with customers there.<LF><LF>While Seafront has yet to be troubled by the Shades, we fear their arrival is only a matter of time. I encourage your village to take all necessary steps to defend yourself from this terrible scourge; the loss of two outposts would be almost too much to bear.<LF><LF>I hope to hear from you soon.

column1: Minha querida,<LF><LF>Meus esforços em cultivar freesias finalmente deram frutos! Eu sei que demorou um pouco, mas eu não queria entrar em contato com você até ter certeza de que poderia me manter firme.<LF><LF>Agora que o dinheiro está começando a entrar, espero que você deixe a vila e venha morar comigo como minha esposa. Eu sei que é repentino, mas não sou muito bom nesse tipo de coisa, então achei que deveria apenas perguntar e ver o que acontece.<LF><LF>Estarei esperando por você.
column2: My dearest,<LF><LF>My efforts at cultivating freesia have finally borne fruit! I know it's taken a while, but I didn't want to contact you until I was sure I could keep my head above water. <LF><LF>Now that the money is starting to roll in, I was hoping you would leave the village and come live with me as my wife. I know it's sudden, but I'm not very good at this type of thing, so I figured I'd just ask and let the chips fall where they may. <LF><LF>I'll be waiting for you.
column3: My dearest,<LF><LF>My efforts at cultivating freesia have finally borne fruit! I know it's taken a while, but I didn't want to contact you until I was sure I could keep my head above water. <LF><LF>Now that the money is starting to roll in, I was hoping you would leave the village and come live with me as my wife. I know it's sudden, but I'm not very good at this type of thing, so I figured I'd just ask and let the chips fall where they may. <LF><LF>I'll be waiting for you.

column1: Oi, <NIER>!<LF><LF>Ei, sou eu! Emil! Desculpe por ter ficado quieto por tanto tempo. Você e Weiss estão se dando bem? Ele ainda usa palavras difíceis e faz todo mundo se sentir burro? Aposto que sim!<LF><LF>De qualquer forma, recentemente encontrei alguns registros que podem nos ajudar a curar a petrificação de Kainé. Você se importaria de vir aqui dar uma olhada?<LF><LF>Obrigado! Estarei esperando!
column2: Hi, <NIER>!<LF><LF>Hey, it's me! Emil! Sorry I've been quiet for so long. Are you and Weiss<LF>getting along all right? Is he still using big words and making everyone<LF>feel dumb? I bet he is!<LF><LF>Anyway, I recently stumbled upon some records that might help us in<LF>curing Kainé's petrification. Would you mind coming here to take a look? <LF><LF>Thanks! I'll be waiting!
column3: Hi, <NIER>!<LF><LF>Hey, it's me! Emil! Sorry I've been quiet for so long. Are you and Weiss<LF>getting along all right? Is he still using big words and making everyone<LF>feel dumb? I bet he is!<LF><LF>Anyway, I recently stumbled upon some records that might help us in<LF>curing Kainé's petrification. Would you mind coming here to take a look? <LF><LF>Thanks! I'll be waiting!

column1: Querido <NIER>,<LF><LF>Isso é para informá-lo que o trabalho de atualização em sua arma foi concluído. A arma está pronta e disponível para ser retirada o mais breve possível.<LF><LF> Também tenho um pedido mais pessoal a fazer a você, um que espero poder discutir mais quando você vier buscar a arma.<LF><LF>Atenciosamente,<LF> Armamento dos Dois Irmãos
column2: Dear <NIER>,<LF><LF>This is to inform you that the upgrade work on your weapon has been<LF>completed. The weapon is ready and available for pickup at your<LF>earliest convenience.<LF><LF>I also have a more personal request to make of you, one I hope we can discuss further once you arrive to pick up the weapon.<LF><LF>Yours,<LF>Two Brothers Weaponry
column3: Dear <NIER>,<LF><LF>This is to inform you that the upgrade work on your weapon has been<LF>completed. The weapon is ready and available for pickup at your<LF>earliest convenience.<LF><LF>I also have a more personal request to make of you, one I hope we can discuss further once you arrive to pick up the weapon.<LF><LF>Yours,<LF>Two Brothers Weaponry

column1: Do escritório do Chefe de Aerie<LF>Para: Popola<LF><LF>Minhas saudações para você e sua vila. Espero que tudo esteja indo bem.<LF><LF>Nossa vila se isolou do mundo por muitos anos,<LF>e por isso decidimos que é hora de mudar nossos caminhos.<LF>Como parte desse esforço, resolvemos estabelecer uma loja<LF>dentro da vila. Agora está aberta para negócios e espero<LF>ver muitos clientes visitando de todo o mundo.<LF><LF>Com relação à palavra-chave "sacrifício" que você mencionou, um de nossos aldeões afirmou saber o significado por trás do termo. Você é mais do que bem-vindo para falar com ele sobre o assunto como parte de sua visita a Aerie.<LF><LF>Espero ouvir de você em breve.
column2: From The Office of the Chief of The Aerie<LF>To: Popola<LF><LF>My greetings to you and your village. I hope everything is going well.<LF><LF>Our village has shut itself away from the world for far too many years,<LF>and we have therefore decided it is time to change our ways.<LF>As part of this endeavor, we have resolved to establish a shop<LF>within the village. It is now open for business, and I look forward<LF>to seeing a great many customers visit from all over the world.<LF><LF>With regards to the "sacrifice" keyword you wrote about, one of our villagers claimed to know the meaning behind the term. You are more than welcome to speak with him on the matter as part of your visit to The Aerie.<LF><LF>I hope to hear from you again soon.
column3: From The Office of the Chief of The Aerie<LF>To: Popola<LF><LF>My greetings to you and your village. I hope everything is going well.<LF><LF>Our village has shut itself away from the world for far too many years,<LF>and we have therefore decided it is time to change our ways.<LF>As part of this endeavor, we have resolved to establish a shop<LF>within the village. It is now open for business, and I look forward<LF>to seeing a great many customers visit from all over the world.<LF><LF>With regards to the "sacrifice" keyword you wrote about, one of our villagers claimed to know the meaning behind the term. You are more than welcome to speak with him on the matter as part of your visit to The Aerie.<LF><LF>I hope to hear from you again soon.

column1: Relatório do Projeto Gestalt 0923<LF><LF>Como observado no relatório anterior, a implementação do modo Gestalt<LF>pode prevenir a síndrome de Coloração Branca que recentemente experimentamos.<LF>A transferência de informações corporais para Réplicas reprimidas pela civilização<LF>está progredindo como planejado, com os genes dos Originais armazenados com segurança. <LF><LF>Nosso papel como androides de vigilância para nos prepararmos para quando a incurável<LF>doença bacteriana eventualmente morrer está também em andamento.<LF>Até agora, isso está progredindo sem problemas.<LF><LF>Observador: 021 Codinome: Popola
column2: Project Gestalt Report 0923<LF><LF>As noted in the previous report, implementation of Gestalt mode<LF>can prevent the white chlorination syndrome we recently experienced.<LF>Transfer of bodily information to civilization-repressed Replicants is<LF>proceeding as planned, with the genes of the Originals safely stored inside. <LF><LF>Our role as surveillance androids to prepare for when the incurable<LF>bacterial disease eventually dies out is also underway.<LF>So far, this is proceeding without issue.<LF><LF>Observer: 021   Codename: Popola
column3: Project Gestalt Report 0923<LF><LF>As noted in the previous report, implementation of Gestalt mode<LF>can prevent the white chlorination syndrome we recently experienced.<LF>Transfer of bodily information to civilization-repressed Replicants is<LF>proceeding as planned, with the genes of the Originals safely stored inside. <LF><LF>Our role as surveillance androids to prepare for when the incurable<LF>bacterial disease eventually dies out is also underway.<LF>So far, this is proceeding without issue.<LF><LF>Observer: 021   Codename: Popola

column1: Relatório do Projeto Gestalt 9182<LF><LF>Este documento discute estratégias potenciais para os casos de recaída que temos observado nos últimos anos. O termo "recaída", é claro, refere-se à perda catastrófica de sentiência vista em certos Gestalts. Esta síndrome desafiou até mesmo nossas estimativas iniciais mais pessimistas e continua a aumentar com uma velocidade perturbadora.<LF><LF>Com alguns Gestalts em recaída começando a atacar Replicantes, há uma necessidade urgente de tomar medidas abrangentes. Continuamos convencidos de que um defeito tecnológico desconhecido no processo de transformação Gestalt é responsável pela condição, mas até agora não fomos capazes de confirmar essa teoria.<LF><LF>A pesquisa dessa condição agora é nossa principal prioridade e parece provável que continue por algum tempo.<LF><LF>Observador: 022 Codinome: Devola
column2: Project Gestalt Report 9182<LF><LF>This document discusses potential strategies for the relapse cases we have observed in recent years. The term "relapse," of course, refers to the catastrophic loss of sentience seen in certain Gestalts. This syndrome has defied even our most pessimistic initial estimates, and continues to trend upward with disturbing speed.<LF><LF>With some relapsed Gestalts beginning to attack Replicants, there is an urgent need to take comprehensive action. We remain convinced that an unknown technological defect in the Gestalt transformation process is responsible for the condition, but so far have been unable to confirm this theory.<LF><LF>Research of this condition is now our top priority, and looks likely to continue for some time.<LF><LF>Observer: 022   Codename: Devola
column3: Project Gestalt Report 9182<LF><LF>This document discusses potential strategies for the relapse cases we have observed in recent years. The term "relapse," of course, refers to the catastrophic loss of sentience seen in certain Gestalts. This syndrome has defied even our most pessimistic initial estimates, and continues to trend upward with disturbing speed.<LF><LF>With some relapsed Gestalts beginning to attack Replicants, there is an urgent need to take comprehensive action. We remain convinced that an unknown technological defect in the Gestalt transformation process is responsible for the condition, but so far have been unable to confirm this theory.<LF><LF>Research of this condition is now our top priority, and looks likely to continue for some time.<LF><LF>Observer: 022   Codename: Devola

column1: Relatório do Projeto Gestalt 10432<LF><LF>Minutos resumidos da Reunião Especial do Comitê 23 (Conferência de Resposta de Emergência)<LF><LF>Problema: Tendência crescente de recaídas observadas (notado e discutido).<LF>Problema: Aceleração do cronograma de restauração (aprovado).<LF>Relatório: Debate sobre o uso do codinome "Noir" para o cronograma de restauração humana.<LF>Relatório: Preparativos para lançar o sistema de decodificação "Weiss" acima mencionado.<LF>Relatório: Coleta de orientações e códigos de liberação para <NIER> juntamente com o lançamento de Weiss.<LF><LF>Observador: Codinome 021: Popola<LF>Observador: Codinome 022: Devola
column2: Project Gestalt Report 10432<LF><LF>Shorthand Minutes of Case 23 (Emergency Response Conference) Committee Special Meeting<LF><LF>Issue: Observed upward trend in relapses (noted and discussed).<LF>Issue: Acceleration of restoration schedule (approved).<LF>Report: Debate over using codename "Noir" for human restoration schedule.<LF>Report: Preparations to launch "Weiss" decoding system for above.<LF>Report: Order collection of guidance and release code for <NIER> alongside Weiss launch.<LF><LF>Observer: 021   Codename: Popola<LF>Observer: 022   Codename: Devola
column3: Project Gestalt Report 10432<LF><LF>Shorthand Minutes of Case 23 (Emergency Response Conference) Committee Special Meeting<LF><LF>Issue: Observed upward trend in relapses (noted and discussed).<LF>Issue: Acceleration of restoration schedule (approved).<LF>Report: Debate over using codename "Noir" for human restoration schedule.<LF>Report: Preparations to launch "Weiss" decoding system for above.<LF>Report: Order collection of guidance and release code for <NIER> alongside Weiss launch.<LF><LF>Observer: 021   Codename: Popola<LF>Observer: 022   Codename: Devola

column1: Relatório do Projeto Gestalt 11242<LF><LF>Concluímos que o aumento de recaídas se deve a um pico inesperado na consciência dos replicantes, bem como a uma instabilidade genética dentro do Gestalt original. (Parece que o efeito do Original em corpos que passaram pelo processo Gestalt não foi previsto com antecedência.)<LF><LF>Ações imediatas devem ser tomadas para identificar as conexões entre essa tendência e o Gestalt original - juntamente com sua irmã, o caso recaído conhecido como Yonah.<LF><LF>O Grupo de Contato do Observador está ficando inquieto, portanto encontrar uma solução para o problema de recaídas deve ser considerado uma prioridade máxima. (Consulte outros relatórios para obter mais detalhes.)<LF><LF>Observador: 021 Codinome: Popola
column2: Project Gestalt Report 11242<LF><LF>We have determined that the rise of relapses was due to an unexpected spike in the sentience of Replicants, as well as a genetic instability within the original Gestalt. (It seems the Original's effect on bodies that have undergone the Gestalt process was not anticipated in advance.)<LF><LF>Immediate action must be undertaken to identify the links between this trend and the original Gestalt—along with its sister, the relapsed case known as Yonah.<LF><LF>The Observer Contact Group is growing uneasy, so finding a solution to the relapse issue should be considered a top priority. (See other reports for more details.)<LF><LF>Observer: 021   Codename: Popola
column3: Project Gestalt Report 11242<LF><LF>We have determined that the rise of relapses was due to an unexpected spike in the sentience of Replicants, as well as a genetic instability within the original Gestalt. (It seems the Original's effect on bodies that have undergone the Gestalt process was not anticipated in advance.)<LF><LF>Immediate action must be undertaken to identify the links between this trend and the original Gestalt—along with its sister, the relapsed case known as Yonah.<LF><LF>The Observer Contact Group is growing uneasy, so finding a solution to the relapse issue should be considered a top priority. (See other reports for more details.)<LF><LF>Observer: 021   Codename: Popola

(Parece que o efeito do Original em corpos que passaram pelo processo Gestalt não foi antecipado com antecedência.)<LF><LF>Ação imediata deve ser tomada para identificar as conexões entre essa tendência e o Gestalt original - juntamente com sua irmã, o caso recidivante conhecido como Yonah.<LF><LF>O Grupo de Contato do Observador está ficando inquieto, portanto encontrar uma solução para o problema da recaída deve ser considerado uma prioridade máxima. (Consulte outros relatórios para obter mais detalhes.)<LF><LF>Observador: Codinome 021: Popola
