column3: During battle, a talking book named Grimoire Weiss appeared.

column1: Você conseguiu salvar Yonah, mas agora marcas escuras apareceram em seu corpo...
column2: You managed to save Yonah, but now dark markings have appeared on her body...
column3: You managed to save Yonah, but now dark markings have appeared on her body...

column1: Yonah foi infectada com Rabisco Negro. Se você não encontrar uma maneira de salvá-la...
column2: Yonah has been infected with the Black Scrawl. If you don't come up with some way to save her...
column3: Yonah has been infected with the Black Scrawl. If you don't come up with some way to save her...

column1: Você ouviu Devola cantar sobre um livro branco que pode salvar o mundo. Fale com Popola para saber mais.
column2: You heard Devola sing about a white book that can save the world. Talk to Popola to learn more.
column3: You heard Devola sing about a white book that can save the world. Talk to Popola to learn more.

column1: De acordo com Popola, você pode ser capaz de salvar Yonah derrotando Sombras e obtendo seus Versos Selados. Você decide sair em busca desses versos.
column2: According to Popola, you may be able to save Yonah by defeating Shades and obtaining their Sealed Verses. You decide to set out in search of these verses.
column3: According to Popola, you may be able to save Yonah by defeating Shades and obtaining their Sealed Verses. You decide to set out in search of these verses.

column1: Segundo relatos, Sombras têm aparecido com frequência em Aerie. Vá lá e veja se os aldeões sabem algo sobre os Sealed Verses.
column2: According to reports, Shades have been appearing in The Aerie with some frequency. Go there and see if the villagers know anything about the Sealed Verses.
column3: According to reports, Shades have been appearing in The Aerie with some frequency. Go there and see if the villagers know anything about the Sealed Verses.

column1: Não parece haver nenhum Sealed Verses aqui. Volte para Popola para ver se ela tem alguma ideia sobre o que fazer em seguida.
column2: It doesn't seem like there are any Sealed Verses here. Return to Popola to see if she has any ideas about what to do next.
column3: It doesn't seem like there are any Sealed Verses here. Return to Popola to see if she has any ideas about what to do next.

column1: Ao voltar, você notou uma estranha grinalda de flores em uma casa perto da saída. Quando você se aproximou, uma mulher apareceu e uma batalha se iniciou.
column2: On your way back, you noticed a strange wreath of flowers at a house near the exit. When you approached it, a woman appeared and a battle ensued.
column3: On your way back, you noticed a strange wreath of flowers at a house near the exit. When you approached it, a woman appeared and a battle ensued.

column1: O nome da mulher era Kainé. Dizem que ela foi possuída por uma Sombra.
column2: The woman's name was Kainé. People say she's been possessed by a Shade.
column3: The woman's name was Kainé. People say she's been possessed by a Shade.

column1: Uma horda de Sombras apareceu em Aerie. Corra para a vila para verificar como Kainé está.
column2: A horde of Shades has appeared in The Aerie. Hurry to the village to check up on Kainé.
column3: A horde of Shades has appeared in The Aerie. Hurry to the village to check up on Kainé.

column1: O gigante Sombra retornou. Mate-o e reivindique seu Sealed Verse.
column2: The giant Shade has returned. Kill it and claim its Sealed Verse.
column3: The giant Shade has returned. Kill it and claim its Sealed Verse.

column1: Com a Sombra derrotada e sua avó vingada, Kainé concorda em viajar com você em busca de uma nova vida.
column2: With the Shade defeated and her grandmother avenged, Kainé agrees to travel with you in search of a new life.
column3: With the Shade defeated and her grandmother avenged, Kainé agrees to travel with you in search of a new life.

column1: Yonah recebeu uma carta de um admirador misterioso. Dirija-se à mansão nas planícies do sul para descobrir mais.
column2: Yonah received a letter from a mysterious admirer. Head for the manor in the southern plains to find out more.
column3: Yonah received a letter from a mysterious admirer. Head for the manor in the southern plains to find out more.

column1: Kainé desapareceu, mas encontrá-la terá que esperar. Primeiro, você deve procurar quem enviou a carta misteriosa.
column2: Kainé has gone missing, but finding her will have to wait. First, you must seek out whoever sent the mysterious letter.
column3: Kainé has gone missing, but finding her will have to wait. First, you must seek out whoever sent the mysterious letter.

column1: Procure a mansão por uma cura para a condição de Emil.
column2: Search the manor for a cure to Emil's condition.
column3: Search the manor for a cure to Emil's condition.

column1: A visão de Emil ainda está amaldiçoada, mas ele prometeu descobrir a chave para uma cura.
column2: Emil's eyesight is still cursed, but he promised to discover the key to a cure.
column3: Emil's eyesight is still cursed, but he promised to discover the key to a cure.

column1: Você conheceu um par de irmãos que vivem perto do Lixão. Entre na montanha e encontre materiais para eles venderem.
column2: You met a pair of brothers who live near the Junk Heap. Enter the mountain and find materials for them to sell.
column3: You met a pair of brothers who live near the Junk Heap. Enter the mountain and find materials for them to sell.

column1: Você deu aos irmãos os materiais que encontrou. Deve ser suficiente para que eles continuem trabalhando por um tempo.
column2: You gave the materials you found to the brothers. It should be sufficient enough for them to keep working for a while longer.
column3: You gave the materials you found to the brothers. It should be sufficient enough for them to keep working for a while longer.

column1: Você precisa de farinha, fermento, manteiga e leite para assar pão para os irmãos Lixão. Vá ver se esses itens são vendidos na vila.
column2: You need flour, yeast, butter, and milk in order to bake bread for the Junk Heap brothers. Go and see if those items are sold in the village.
column3: You need flour, yeast, butter, and milk in order to bake bread for the Junk Heap brothers. Go and see if those items are sold in the village.

column1: Você entregou o pão acabado para os irmãos. Foi diferente do da mãe deles, mas eles pareciam satisfeitos mesmo assim.
column2: You delivered the finished bread to the brothers. It was different from their mother's, but they seemed satisfied nonetheless.
column3: You delivered the finished bread to the brothers. It was different from their mother's, but they seemed satisfied nonetheless.

column1: O irmão mais novo, angustiado por sua mãe ainda estar desaparecida, não para de chorar. Volte para dentro do Lixão e procure por ela.
column2: The younger brother, distraught that his mother is still missing, won't stop crying. Head back inside the Junk Heap and search for her.
column3: The younger brother, distraught that his mother is still missing, won't stop crying. Head back inside the Junk Heap and search for her.

column1: Depois de derrotar um robô gigante, você encontrou os corpos de um homem e uma mulher. A mãe dos meninos aparentemente abandonou seus filhos para fugir com seu amante.
column2: After defeating a giant robot, you found the bodies of a man and a woman. The boys' mother had apparently abandoned her sons in order to run off with her lover.
column3: After defeating a giant robot, you found the bodies of a man and a woman. The boys' mother had apparently abandoned her sons in order to run off with her lover.

column1: Vá para Beira-mar e encontre um peixe xamã para Popola.
column2: Head to Seafront and find a shaman fish for Popola.
column3: Head to Seafront and find a shaman fish for Popola.

column1: Pergunte pela cidade até descobrir como pescar um peixe xamã.
column2: Ask around town until you learn how to catch a shaman fish.
column3: Ask around town until you learn how to catch a shaman fish.

column1: Uma velha mal-humorada quer que você faça com que o correio entregue suas correspondências.
column2: A cranky old woman wants you to get the post office to deliver her mail.
column3: A cranky old woman wants you to get the post office to deliver her mail.

column1: Você entregou a carta da velha senhora.
column2: You delivered the old woman's letter.
column3: You delivered the old woman's letter.

column1: O carteiro de Beira-mar tem um pedido pessoal para você.
column2: The postman of Seafront has a personal request for you.
column3: The postman of Seafront has a personal request for you.

column1: Você foi solicitado a entregar uma carta para o carteiro ferido. Leve a carta para a velha senhora no farol.
column2: You were asked to deliver a letter for the injured postman. Bring the letter to the old woman in the lighthouse.
column3: You were asked to deliver a letter for the injured postman. Bring the letter to the old woman in the lighthouse.

column1: Você entregou a carta. A senhora do farol não parece muito bem...
column2: You delivered the letter. The lighthouse lady doesn't look very well...
column3: You delivered the letter. The lighthouse lady doesn't look very well...

column1: A irritadiça senhora do farol está incomodando novamente o carteiro de Beira-mar. Vá ver se pode ajudar.
column2: The cranky lighthouse lady is bothering the Seafront postman again. Go see if you can help.
column3: The cranky lighthouse lady is bothering the Seafront postman again. Go see if you can help.

column1: Você foi solicitado a persuadir a senhora do farol a permanecer em seu posto. É difícil reunir muito entusiasmo para isso...
column2: You were asked to persuade the lighthouse lady to stay at her post. It's hard to drum up much enthusiasm for this...
column3: You were asked to persuade the lighthouse lady to stay at her post. It's hard to drum up much enthusiasm for this...

column1: A senhora do farol não tem muito tempo de vida. Convença o carteiro que ela deve ser autorizada a partir.
column2: The lighthouse lady doesn't have long to live. Convince the postman that she should be allowed to leave.
column3: The lighthouse lady doesn't have long to live. Convince the postman that she should be allowed to leave.

column1: Volte para o posto de correios e tente argumentar com o carteiro mais uma vez.
column2: Return to the post office and try to reason with the postman one more time.
column3: Return to the post office and try to reason with the postman one more time.

column1: As cartas para a senhora do farol foram todas escritas pelo carteiro, e agora ele te deu uma nova. Você deve contar a verdade para ela, ou ...?
column2: The letters to the lighthouse lady were all written by the postman, and now he's given you a new one. Should you tell her the truth, or...?
column3: The letters to the lighthouse lady were all written by the postman, and now he's given you a new one. Should you tell her the truth, or...?

column1: Contar a verdade para a senhora do farol teria partido o coração dela. Mas você fez a escolha certa ...?
column2: Telling the lighthouse lady the truth would have broken her heart. But did you make the right choice...?
column3: Telling the lighthouse lady the truth would have broken her heart. But did you make the right choice...?

column1: Contar a verdade para a senhora do farol teria partido o coração dela. Mas você fez a escolha certa ...?
column2: Telling the lighthouse lady the truth would have broken her heart. But did you make the right choice...?
column3: Telling the lighthouse lady the truth would have broken her heart. But did you make the right choice...?

column1: O carteiro da beira-mar quer discutir algo com você.
column2: The Seafront postman wants to discuss something with you.
column3: The Seafront postman wants to discuss something with you.

column1: A senhora do farol morreu. Você só pode esperar que ela tenha sido feliz no final.
column2: The lighthouse lady has died. You can only hope she was happy at the end.
column3: The lighthouse lady has died. You can only hope she was happy at the end.

column1: A cidade de Facade cortou todo o contato com o mundo exterior. Encontre um caminho para dentro.
column2: The town of Facade has cut off all contact with the outside world. Find a way inside.
column3: The town of Facade has cut off all contact with the outside world. Find a way inside.

column1: Aparentemente Kainé é capaz de entrar em Facade livremente, embora ela não diga como.
column2: Apparently Kainé is able to enter Facade freely, although she won't say how.
column3: Apparently Kainé is able to enter Facade freely, although she won't say how.

column1: Uma garota chamada Fyra se voluntariou para lhe mostrar por aí.
column2: A girl named Fyra has volunteered to show you around.
column3: A girl named Fyra has volunteered to show you around.

column1: Graças a Fyra, você foi capaz de encomendar um filtro de água.
column2: Thanks to Fyra, you were able to order a water filter.
column3: Thanks to Fyra, you were able to order a water filter.

column1: Entregar o filtro de água para Popola.
column2: Deliver the water filter to Popola.
column3: Deliver the water filter to Popola.

column1: O filtro de água está pronto. Vá para Facade e pegue-o.
column2: The water filter is ready. Head to Facade and pick it up.
column3: The water filter is ready. Head to Facade and pick it up.

column1: Mudança de planos - agora você deve ajudar o príncipe de Facade. Fyra irá guiá-lo até o Templo Árido.
column2: Change of plans—now you must aid the prince of Facade. Fyra will guide you to the Barren Temple.
column3: Change of plans—now you must aid the prince of Facade. Fyra will guide you to the Barren Temple.

column1: Você resgatou com sucesso o príncipe de Facade.
column2: You successfully rescued the prince of Facade.
column3: You successfully rescued the prince of Facade.

column1: O príncipe agora é rei. Com a Regra Zero em vigor, a cidade certamente verá dias prósperos novamente.
column2: The prince is now king. With Rule Zero in place, the town is sure to see prosperous days again.
column3: The prince is now king. With Rule Zero in place, the town is sure to see prosperous days again.

column1: Yonah está ficando sem remédios. Vá até o portão sul e encontre algumas folhas de vapor.
column2: Yonah is running out of medicine. Venture to the southern gate and find some vapor moss.
column3: Yonah is running out of medicine. Venture to the southern gate and find some vapor moss.

column1: Sombras invadiram a vila onde você e Yonah vivem. Você deve detê-los e manter Yonah segura!
column2: Shades have invaded the village where you and Yonah live. You must stop them and keep Yonah safe!
column3: Shades have invaded the village where you and Yonah live. You must stop them and keep Yonah safe!

column1: O dia está perdido. Grimório Noir derrotou seu grupo e Yonah foi roubada. Pior ainda, Emil foi forçado a petrificar Kainé para manter uma Monstruosa Sombra enterrado no porão da biblioteca. Arrasado pela tristeza, você jura libertá-los, não importa o custo.
column2: The day is lost. Grimoire Noir has defeated your party, and Yonah has been stolen away. Worse yet, Emil was forced to petrify Kainé to keep a monstrous Shade entombed in the library's basement. Stricken by grief, you swear to free them all, no matter what the cost.
column3: The day is lost. Grimoire Noir has defeated your party, and Yonah has been stolen away. Worse yet, Emil was forced to petrify Kainé to keep a monstrous Shade entombed in the library's basement. Stricken by grief, you swear to free them all, no matter what the cost.

column1: Cinco anos após a captura de Yonah, o mundo mudou.
column2: Five years after Yonah was taken, the world has changed.
column3: Five years after Yonah was taken, the world has changed.

column1: Popola tem uma carta para você. Visite-a e descubra sobre o que se trata.
column2: Popola has a letter for you. Visit her and see what it's about.
column3: Popola has a letter for you. Visit her and see what it's about.

column1: A carta é de Emil, que quer falar com você sobre Kainé. Vá visitá-lo.
column2: The letter is from Emil, who wants to talk to you about Kainé. Go pay him a visit.
column3: The letter is from Emil, who wants to talk to you about Kainé. Go pay him a visit.

column1: Vá ver Emil para discutir a condição de Kainé.
column2: Go see Emil to discuss Kainé's condition.
column3: Go see Emil to discuss Kainé's condition.

column1: Emil descobriu algo chamado Sala de Planejamento, que pode permitir que ele controle seus poderes. Dirija-se ao pátio interno e encontre a entrada da sala.
column2: Emil has discovered something called the Planning Room which may allow him to control his powers. Head for the inner courtyard and find the room's entrance.
column3: Emil has discovered something called the Planning Room which may allow him to control his powers. Head for the inner courtyard and find the room's entrance.

column1: No interior da Sala de Planejamento, você derrotou uma arma conhecida como Número 6. O evento transformou Emil em um monstro, mas também concedeu a ele controle de seus poderes.
column2: Deep inside the Planning Room, you defeated a weapon known as Number 6. The event transformed Emil into a monster, but also granted him control of his powers.
column3: Deep inside the Planning Room, you defeated a weapon known as Number 6. The event transformed Emil into a monster, but also granted him control of his powers.

column1: Há cinco anos, Kainé se petrificou para enterrar uma Sombra. Agora, você tem a habilidade de resgatá-la.
column2: Five years ago, Kainé had herself petrified in order to entomb a Shade. You now have the ability to rescue her.
column3: Five years ago, Kainé had herself petrified in order to entomb a Shade. You now have the ability to rescue her.

column1: A maldição de Kainé foi levantada e a Sombra selada foi derrotada. Você e seus amigos estão felizes em vê-la viva e bem.
column2: Kainé's curse has been lifted, and the sealed Shade defeated. You and your friends are overjoyed to see her alive and well.
column3: Kainé's curse has been lifted, and the sealed Shade defeated. You and your friends are overjoyed to see her alive and well.

column1: De acordo com Popola, é possível chegar ao covil do Shadowlord a partir do Santuário Perdido. O antigo caminho desapareceu, mas você pode usar um barco para chegar a uma estrada alternativa perto do rio. Encontre essa estrada e vá resgatar Yonah.
column2: According to Popola, it's possible to reach the Shadowlord's lair from the Lost Shrine. The old path is gone, but you can use a boat to reach an alternate road near the river. Find this road and go rescue Yonah.
column3: According to Popola, it's possible to reach the Shadowlord's lair from the Lost Shrine. The old path is gone, but you can use a boat to reach an alternate road near the river. Find this road and go rescue Yonah.

column1: Você recebeu uma carta anunciando a grande reabertura da Armamento dos Dois Irmãos.
column2: You received a letter announcing the grand re-opening of Two Brothers Weaponry.
column3: You received a letter announcing the grand re-opening of Two Brothers Weaponry.

column1: O irmão mais velho morreu há quatro anos, deixando o mais novo para tocar a loja sozinho. Colete os materiais que ele precisa para criar uma nova arma.
column2: The older brother died four years ago, leaving the younger to run the shop alone. Collect the materials he needs to create a new weapon.
column3: The older brother died four years ago, leaving the younger to run the shop alone. Collect the materials he needs to create a new weapon.

column1: O irmão mais novo pediu para você derrotar a Sombra que matou seu irmão, junto com o robô gigante que o acompanha. Procure por eles nas profundezas do Lixãos.
column2: The younger brother asked you to defeat the Shade that killed his sibling, along with the giant robot that accompanies it. Search for them deep inside the Junk Heap.
column3: The younger brother asked you to defeat the Shade that killed his sibling, along with the giant robot that accompanies it. Search for them deep inside the Junk Heap.

column1: A Sombra e o robô gigante foram derrotados. A vingança do irmão está completa.
column2: The Shade and the giant robot have been defeated. The brother's revenge is complete.
column3: The Shade and the giant robot have been defeated. The brother's revenge is complete.

column1: Encontre um caminho no Brilho Perdido que leve ao covil do Shadowlord.
column2: Find a path in the Lost Shine that leads to the Shadowlord's lair.
column3: Find a path in the Lost Shine that leads to the Shadowlord's lair.

column1: Kainé, ferida em batalha, foi possuída por uma Sombra chamada Tyrann que possui seu corpo. Depois de uma luta, ela conseguiu recuperar sua consciência antes que fosse perdida para sempre.
column2: Kainé, wounded in battle, was taken over by a Shade named Tyrann that possesses her body. After a struggle, she managed to regain her consciousness before it was lost forever.
column3: Kainé, wounded in battle, was taken over by a Shade named Tyrann that possesses her body. After a struggle, she managed to regain her consciousness before it was lost forever.

column1: Você encontrou uma porta no altar, mas ela estava trancada por um código secreto. Peça ajuda a Popola para quebrar o código.
column2: You found a doorway at the altar, but it was locked by a secret code. Ask Popola for a way to crack the code.
column3: You found a doorway at the altar, but it was locked by a secret code. Ask Popola for a way to crack the code.

column1: Você recebeu um convite de casamento do rei de Facade.
column2: You received a wedding invite from the king of Facade.
column3: You received a wedding invite from the king of Facade.

column1: Uma matilha de lobos invadiu a cerimônia de casamento, matando Fyra enquanto ela tentava proteger o rei. Você deveria deixá-lo em luto por agora...
column2: A pack of wolves crashed the wedding ceremony, killing Fyra as she tried to protect the king. You should leave him to mourn for now...
column3: A pack of wolves crashed the wedding ceremony, killing Fyra as she tried to protect the king. You should leave him to mourn for now...

column1: O rei decidiu lutar contra os lobos e vingar a morte de sua amada. Corra para Facade e dê a ele qualquer ajuda necessária.
column2: The king has chosen to fight the wolves and avenge the death of his beloved. Rush to Facade and give him whatever aid is required.
column3: The king has chosen to fight the wolves and avenge the death of his beloved. Rush to Facade and give him whatever aid is required.

column1: Você derrotou o líder da matilha de lobos e vingou Fyra.
column2: You defeated the wolves' pack leader and avenged Fyra.
column3: You defeated the wolves' pack leader and avenged Fyra.

column1: Coisas estranhas estão acontecendo em Aerie. Passe por lá enquanto estiver na missão de Popola e veja o que está acontecendo.
column2: Strange things are happening in The Aerie. Stop by while on Popola's errand and see what's going on.
column3: Strange things are happening in The Aerie. Stop by while on Popola's errand and see what's going on.

column1: Alguns dos aldeões de Aerie foram possuídos por Sombras. No meio do caos, Kainé foi atacada por uma Sombra.
column2: Some of The Aerie's villagers have been possessed by Shades. In the midst of the chaos, Kainé was attacked by a Shade.
column3: Some of The Aerie's villagers have been possessed by Shades. In the midst of the chaos, Kainé was attacked by a Shade.

column1: Enquanto você lutava contra a grande massa de Sombras, Emil perdeu o controle de seu poder e destruiu Aerie.
column2: As you fought the giant mass of Shades, Emil lost control of his power and destroyed The Aerie.
column3: As you fought the giant mass of Shades, Emil lost control of his power and destroyed The Aerie.

column1: Agora você tem todas as chaves necessárias. Faça seus preparativos finais e então vá para o Santuário Perdido.
column2: You now have all the required keys. Make your final preparations and then head to the Lost Shrine.
column3: You now have all the required keys. Make your final preparations and then head to the Lost Shrine.

column1: Usando as chaves, você abriu um caminho do altar até o covil do Shadowlord.
column2: Using the keys, you opened a path from the altar to the Shadowlord's lair.
column3: Using the keys, you opened a path from the altar to the Shadowlord's lair.

column1: Você finalmente chegou ao castelo do Shadowlord. Chegou a hora de trazer Yonah de volta!
column2: You've finally arrived at the Shadowlord's castle. The time has come to get Yonah back!
column3: You've finally arrived at the Shadowlord's castle. The time has come to get Yonah back!

column1: Um comerciante no distrito comercial pediu que você caçasse algumas ovelhas. Colete três pedaços de carneiro nas planícies do norte e leve de volta para o cliente.
column2: A merchant in the shopping district has asked you to hunt some sheep. Collect three pieces of mutton in the northern plains and bring them back to the client.
column3: A merchant in the shopping district has asked you to hunt some sheep. Collect three pieces of mutton in the northern plains and bring them back to the client.

column1: Você entregou a carneiro para o cliente. Relate a Popola para completar o trabalho.
column2: You gave the mutton to the client. Report back to Popola to complete the job.
column3: You gave the mutton to the client. Report back to Popola to complete the job.

column1: Você relatou seu sucesso para Popola.
column2: You reported your success to Popola.
column3: You reported your success to Popola.

column1: Popola enviou você em uma missão de coleta de ervas. Procure nas planícies do norte por duas ervas medicinais e traga de volta para ela.
column2: Popola has sent you on an herb-gathering mission. Search the northern plains for two medicinal herbs and bring them back to her.
column3: Popola has sent you on an herb-gathering mission. Search the northern plains for two medicinal herbs and bring them back to her.

column1: Você conseguiu as ervas medicinais. Traga-as para Popola.
column2: You got the medicinal herbs. Bring them to Popola.
column3: You got the medicinal herbs. Bring them to Popola.

column1: Você entregou as ervas medicinais para Popola.
column2: You gave the medicinal herbs to Popola.
column3: You gave the medicinal herbs to Popola.

column1: Um guarda na porta norte pediu para você entregar uma mensagem para a esposa do ferreiro.
column2: A guard at the northern gate asked you to deliver a message to the blacksmith's wife.
column3: A guard at the northern gate asked you to deliver a message to the blacksmith's wife.

column1: Você entregou a mensagem para o guarda da porta.
column2: You delivered the message for the gate guard.
column3: You delivered the message for the gate guard.

column1: Popola precisa que você adquira alguns documentos para ela. Visite os guardas nas portas norte, leste e sul e colete documentos de cada um deles.
column2: Popola needs you to acquire some documents for her. Visit the guards at the northern, eastern, and southern gates and collect documents from each of them.
column3: Popola needs you to acquire some documents for her. Visit the guards at the northern, eastern, and southern gates and collect documents from each of them.

column1: Você coletou os documentos. Traga-os de volta para Popola.
column2: You collected the documents. Bring them back to Popola.
column3: You collected the documents. Bring them back to Popola.

column1: Você coletou os documentos e os entregou para Popola.
column2: You collected the documents and gave them to Popola.
column3: You collected the documents and gave them to Popola.

column3: A woman in front of the king of Facade's palace needs you to run an errand. The rules state that she can't expressly state the name of the item she wants, so you must search for ten "round, striped food objects."

column3: A Facade royal guard needs titanium alloy and a crystal so he can make a mask.

column3: The shopkeeper at the strange-thing store in Facade has asked you to collect ten wolf hides as a gift for his wife. It seems they recently had an argument...

column3: You collected the hides. Bring them back to the client.

column3: A person near the mailbox in Facade wants some seeds to grow in the desert. Bring the client ten pink moonflower seeds.

column3: The tavern keeper in Seafront needs ingredients for a new recipe. Collect ten giant catfish and ten bags of rice.

column3: You gave the ingredients to the client.<LF>It seems he can't clean the slimy, smelly fish. Can a restaurant like this survive in a coastal town?

column2: Yonah asked you for a melon.

column2: You did your best to enjoy Yonah's cooking.

column2: A man near the fountain in Seafront's plaza has given you a love letter he wants delivered to his lover in The Aerie. The recipient lives near the village's chief.
column3: A man near the fountain in Seafront's plaza has given you a love letter he wants delivered to his lover in The Aerie. The recipient lives near the village's chief.

column2: The man's lover seems to be gone. Return to him and report your findings.
column3: The man's lover seems to be gone. Return to him and report your findings.

column2: You explained the situation to the man, but he says he's not ready to give up just yet.
column3: You explained the situation to the man, but he says he's not ready to give up just yet.

column2: Have Devola and Popola sing a song for you. Discuss the matter with both of them.
column3: Have Devola and Popola sing a song for you. Discuss the matter with both of them.

column3: Apparently Popola needs a special drink in order to sing. Get it from the tavern in Seafront.

column2: The drink is made of certain special ingredients. Collect five lizard tails and five mouse tails.
column3: The drink is made of certain special ingredients. Collect five lizard tails and five mouse tails.

column2: You collected the ingredients. Take them to the Seafront tavern.
column3: You collected the ingredients. Take them to the Seafront tavern.

column1: Você criou a bebida com sucesso. Volte para Popola e relate o resultado.
column2: You successfully created the drink. Report back to Popola.
column3: You successfully created the drink. Report back to Popola.

column2: The sisters have sung their song...though frankly, the drink Popola requested is much more fascinating.
column3: The sisters have sung their song...though frankly, the drink Popola requested is much more fascinating.

column3: An old man near the shopping district's southern entrance needs help finding his dog. The animal likes to roam the northern plains.

column3: You found the dog, but it was already dead. Take the leaf from its mouth and return it to its master.

column2: The master had already died by the time you returned.
column3: The master had already died by the time you returned.

column2: A man aboard a ship docked in Seafront needs to build his inventory so he can begin trading. Collect ten bundles of wool, five lumps of natural rubber, and ten goat hides.
column3: A man aboard a ship docked in Seafront needs to build his inventory so he can begin trading. Collect ten bundles of wool, five lumps of natural rubber, and ten goat hides.

column1: Você coletou os materiais. Leve-os de volta para o cliente.

column2: You delivered the goods. Hopefully your client can build a successful trading business.
column3: You delivered the goods. Hopefully your client can build a successful trading business.

column3: A man across the way from the weapon shop near the southern gate needs help finding his runaway son. The young man apparently wears an unusual-looking hat.

column3: The runaway wants to thank the tavern keeper's family for helping him. Bring him five pieces of mutton and three pieces of goat meat.

column2: You collected all of the meat. Bring it to the tavern keeper.
column3: You collected all of the meat. Bring it to the tavern keeper.

column2: You've lost the runaway. Return to his parents.
column3: You've lost the runaway. Return to his parents.

column2: Look around Seafront for clues to the runaway's whereabouts.
column3: Look around Seafront for clues to the runaway's whereabouts.

column3: You found the runaway in Facade. He's making a run for it—nab him!

column3: The runaway has seen the error of his ways. Report back to his parents.

column3: Now the runaway's parents are missing! ...Apparently the entire family is full of liars.

column2: A man in the open area near the lighthouse wants you to procure fluorite so he can make a fashion accessory for his lover. You can find it in Facade's strange-thing store.
column3: A man in the open area near the lighthouse wants you to procure fluorite so he can make a fashion accessory for his lover. You can find it in Facade's strange-thing store.

column2: It seems the required materials are in the Barren Temple.

column2: You gave the ore to the client. Ah, love...
column3: You gave the ore to the client. Ah, love...

column3: The child of Facade's blacksmith has left home and is headed for the desert.<LF>His parents want you to bring him back.

column3: Ignoring your pleas, the child set off toward a den of wolves.<LF>Don't let him fight alone!

column3: A family near Facade's strange-thing store cannot find their daughter. Ask around Facade and see what you can learn.

column2: The daughter's boyfriend stands watch over the town entrance.

column3: You found traces of blood on the lowest level of town. It's time to meet with the girl's boyfriend.

column3: The girl's body was dumped at the sandspout well just outside Facade. Search the location for clues.

column2: The girl was alive the whole time! How strange...
column3: The girl was alive the whole time! How strange...

column3: A guard at Facade's gate asked you to eliminate the bandits desecrating the Barren Temple.

column3: The bandits have inadvertently broken the seal placed on a Shade. It must be defeated at once.

column2: You defeated the Shade. Report back to the client.
column3: You defeated the Shade. Report back to the client.

column2: You reported back to the client. Hopefully this will quiet things down in the temple.
column3: You reported back to the client. Hopefully this will quiet things down in the temple.

column3: An old lady standing under a tree in Seafront needs you to recover cargo from a ship that was lost at sea. Search the shorelines and find her three pieces of cargo.

column2: You retrieved the cargo from the Seafront shoreline.

column2: It seems the lighthouse lady was involved...

column2: You spoke with the client. That jewel has quite a story behind it...
column3: You spoke with the client. That jewel has quite a story behind it...

column3: A young man wants to become a soldier. Help him by collecting five pieces of iron ore and five logs.

column2: You collected the materials. Bring them back to the young man.

column1: O jovem passou no exame de entrada militar.
column2: The young man has passed the military entrance exam.
column3: The young man has passed the military entrance exam.

column2: The young man has failed the military entrance exam.
